version.comment: Bitcoin Core version with an available Warnet tank image on Dockerhub. May also be a GitHub repository with format user/repository:branch to build from source code

image.comment: Bitcoin Core Warnet tank image on Dockerhub with the format repository/image:tag

bitcoin_config.comment: A string of Bitcoin Core options in command-line format, e.g. '-debug=net -blocksonly'

tc_netem.comment: A tc-netem command as a string beginning with 'tc qdisc add dev eth0 root netem'

exporter.comment: Whether to attach a Prometheus data exporter to the tank

collect_logs.comment: Whether to collect Bitcoin Core debug logs with Promtail

build_args.comment: A string of configure options used when building Bitcoin Core from source code, e.g. '--without-gui --disable-tests'

ln.comment: Attach a lightning network node of this implementation (currently only supports 'lnd')

ln-image.comment: Specify a lightning network node image from Dockerhub with the format repository/image:tag

ln-cb-image.comment: Specify a lnd Circuit Breaker image from Dockerhub with the format repository/image:tag

channel.comment: Indicate that this edge is a lightning channel with this specified capacity
